notes: Install or update GOG Galaxy 2.0 plugins by running these commands:
gog-plugins-downloader-stores: Steam, Origin, Uplay, Epic, PSN, BattleNet, and more.
gog-plugins-downloader-games: Minecraft, Final Fantasy XIV, Path of Exile, Guild Wars 2, and more.
gog-plugins-downloader-emulators: bSNES, RetroArch, Cemu, Dolphin, Citra, mGBA, and more.
